name: Last Night (A_Nameless_Tess)
description:
Last Night is a simple tiding up simulator.

You wake up in the mornig after a your usual night routine, you haven't done the dishes, there is some sweeping and moping to do and your house is a bit of a mess. You have enough time to do all your chores but you could also simply leave to work and forget all the trouble.

This is a class project, despite all the bugs I don't think it'll be updated, I hope you enjoy this tiny experience regardless :)
